website_summaries.verdict: Does a nice job of avoiding streaks as it cleans. Doesn't use harsh ingredients.
pros: As it cleans, this product enhances the natural patterns contained in the stone
With regular use for cleaning, the counter top will resist stains and soils
Safe to use with quartz, marble, granite, quartzite, limestone, and soapstone
Delivers an average price per ounce
cons: Some quality control issues with bottles leaking

customer_reviews.title: Great for granite!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product on my granite counters since they were installed. This product cleans and polishes my granite daily. The counters are 7 years old and I receive compliments on their clean and shiny appearance whenever guests come into the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This and and all other Weiman kitchen/home cleaning/polishing products are the best. I have been using Weiman for years. Happy to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: I’ll blame poor shipping because once I used the product I didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it arrived leaking, I’ll blame poor shipping because once I used the product I didn’t even care that it was leaking it works so well! We’ve tried several other granite cleaners and this is the favorite by far. All others we have tried leave a film after wiping but this one does not! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Thanks so much for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Always a reliable product. I never use anything else to clean my granite countertops. Thanks so much for a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa samra

customer_reviews.title: Streak Free Granite Cleaner and Polish
customer_reviews.text: Weiman Granite Cleaner & Polish is fantastic. Easy to apply, streak free, and polishes as you clean up. I would highly recommend it. Ordering it on Amazon was incredibly easy. For some reason, this cleaner isn't always available in the grocery store. I ordered after searching two different groceries. Sure wish I had just ordered it in the first place.The shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This is not what I received.
customer_reviews.text: When I found this product I was really excited because it’s difficult to find anti-bacterial items now and I had found out the day prior to ordering I tested positive for Covid-19. Needless to say I was extremely disappointed when the people in the household called me in the hospital and said that it was not a disinfectant as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you open the bag there will be cleaner that got out of the bag and it is messy
customer_reviews.text: I have just finished redoing my kitchen and I replaced the old counter top with granit. This cleaner seems to do a good job without to much work and there is no residue. My problem was that the way it was packaged it had leaked out some of the cleaner into the bag so it was pretty messy to open.
customer_reviews.author: leigh franzen

customer_reviews.title: Granite Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this granite cleaner after being unhappy with other brands I had purchased. It is easy to use, doesn’t smear or leave behind streaks. Best granite cleaner I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great Granite All-Around Spray
customer_reviews.text: This product should be required for all granit to owners. It’s like a miracle drug except fr agranite. Brings out color, seals, protects and smells like a lilac on a dew filled Saturday morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans with a shine
customer_reviews.text: Cleans with a nice shine that doesn't leave residue. No aweful smell and is easy to use for my hand. Spray is fine mist but powerful which beats any others. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Venita Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: One stop cleaning and polish for granite, must have.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product weekly to clean all of my granite. Great shine and cleans well too.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mahon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: I use a microfiber towel to polish and the counter is as shiny as when it was put in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good & bad
customer_reviews.text: Only disappointment is that you must wait several minutes for this product to have antibacterial effect. By that time the product is hard to wipe & the shine of granite is lost. I then use a regular granite cleaner to restore the shine
customer_reviews.author: szj

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and Shines
customer_reviews.text: Getting hard to find in local retail stores. Have been using on black granite countertops for 8-yrs. Cleans and shine great with a microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and polishes.
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning and putting a nice shine on our granite. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Harding

customer_reviews.title: NICE for laminate counter tops
customer_reviews.text: Love it.... Love ALL of Weiman products (I think I bought them all.) Don't know which one I like better. Changes from day to day depending on what I tackle. Maybe this one is my fave... or the furniture polish
customer_reviews.author: The Bean

customer_reviews.title: Shines, cleans, and disinfects.  Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great on my granite and quartz countertops. I wanted a product that I could use on both since I have granite in my bar and quartz in the kitchen. This stuff is awesome. I just bought two of the 64 oz. refill bottles for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Alldaffer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a pleasant or unpleasant odor but works well.
customer_reviews.author: kmoran2

customer_reviews.title: Weiman Granite Cleaner and Polish
customer_reviews.text: Cleans and shine counter at low cost On par with other of their fine products
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Contegiacomo

customer_reviews.title: No Streaking
customer_reviews.text: This cleans good and doesn't leave a film or streaking.
customer_reviews.author: DPro

customer_reviews.title: This product is safe to use daily
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans and protects my kitchen granite countertops very well. I use it whenever I wipe down the countertops after cooking to shine them up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. I used it on granite, stone, stainless, and porcelain. It is easy to use and everything shines. Even removed some hardwater marks with ease. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: Makes counters look new
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a home with dull quartz countertops. When I applied this it really polished them up.
customer_reviews.author: mona t lydon rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Granite
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! Have tried so many products on my granite and this is the ONLY one that makes them so shiny with zero streaks!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on floors
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but DO NOT USE ON FLOORS. The bottle does not have a warning about using this product on floors, it will make them dangerously slippery. Works great on counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad a friend suggested this for my dark granite/stone counters. First cleaner that works and also polishes. My kitchen counters are awful to keep smudge free and this really worked.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time. Works better than what I was using. A keeper.
customer_reviews.author: NorthRidge

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to protect my counter tops from using other disinfect So happy I did. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nima Fanaro

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It cleans and polished. Our countertops look clean and they shine. Good product. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love the Brand
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product and it's as good or better then all competing products
customer_reviews.author: Barry Newman

customer_reviews.title: Protects surface and kills bacteria on granite.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of use in applying this product. Appreciate that in kills 99.9% of bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Billings

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my granite countertops. Product cleans the countertops easily without damage to the surface and leaves the granite brand new beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Streak free shine
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner! Keeps my countertops so clean and streak free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just bought our house in July and this is probably my favorite cleaning product. Leaves the granite looking polished and clean! Helps preserve from wear and tear too.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It makes my granite shiny and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and Disinfects
customer_reviews.text: Works great on quartz countertops and the solid surface in our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer head needs revamp
customer_reviews.text: Need a revamp of packaging. Received these in mail from Amazon & sprayer heads were broken and each bottle leaked & ruined them. Very thin plastic cover on sprayer. Otherwise I like Weiman products Joan Gray
customer_reviews.author: Joan Gray...these were not to b returned. Messy. Jg I hve never received my refund that was purchase IN MARCH./

customer_reviews.title: See above.
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job. Makes the sinks look clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Meshekow

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous on quartz
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I've ordered this product. Love it, works great and smells really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and made my counters shine and are soooooo smooth! Great find!

customer_reviews.title: Like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a nice shine after cleaning !! No offensive odor
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Makes granite slick and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product which he uses once a month for our granite countertops in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Dislike change
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyy overpriced with not much product in them. I think I'll stick to my Windex
customer_reviews.author: Jillmarie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granite counters and it does not leave you with shiny, but smeared counters. i am most disappointed with it and wish I had returned it in my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cuba

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find safe disinfectant for marble
customer_reviews.text: I like that it disinfects and does not ruin my stone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is so wonderful I purchased all the cleaners weiman makes. My kitchen and bathrooms look out of a magazine fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the bag, bottles were leaking all over the place. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market! I’ve used soooo many different ones, they all streak. I use it on Quartz counters....LOVE IT, SHINES, nice mild scent. The stainless steel wipes are amazing too...especially for that Saturday breakfast grease exploding breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Trenna C.

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really make my granite shine anymore than cheaper cleaner from walmart.

customer_reviews.title: Order status!
customer_reviews.text: Received only (!) one of 2 pack of Weiman Disinfectant Granite Daily Clean % Shine. Please review order as placed ---September 1, 2020.

customer_reviews.title: Qualit of producer
customer_reviews.text: This works great on granite. It gives a nice shine without any film or greasiness. Nice product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the bottle sprayers was broken. The product is great

customer_reviews.title: Brought back the shine on my counter tops
customer_reviews.text: The product works great I noticed right after the first use on how it brought back the shine on the counter top .. extremely happy with purchase

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Leaves a clean look on the countertops and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: If you have granite. You need this stuff. Great for everyday use.

customer_reviews.title: Clean counters are my jam!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is perfect. Makes my kitchen sparkle and countertops gleam!

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff and so glad we found it here!

customer_reviews.title: Nice job
customer_reviews.text: It does a nice job of cleaning and shining. It doesn't make it super-shiny, but it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L Williams

customer_reviews.title: The product may have been repackaged.
customer_reviews.text: Not yet in use. The effect is unknown.But the goods are not the same as the pictures on the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful. It cleans my granite beautifully and leaves it with a wonderful shine.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller bottles than a normal cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are smaller than I expected. Very fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and leaves the countertops perfectly clean and beautifully shiny.

customer_reviews.title: I I have black counter tops and it s amazing how much less polishing I have to do to ...
customer_reviews.text: I I have black counter tops and it s amazing how much less polishing I have to do to have them look really elegant.
customer_reviews.author: ELFRIEDE R. HOLMES

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The company makes good products.
customer_reviews.author: scott niles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works better than other products and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Package leaked
customer_reviews.text: I like your product however mine had leaked and even the outside package was wet when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Null

customer_reviews.title: product may be great but shipping was
customer_reviews.text: they leaked out in the package very messy and I lost part of the product. product may be great but shipping was bad
customer_reviews.author: Betty J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use daily on my granite kitchen island and granite counters. Keeps them looking like new!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald V. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product but leaked!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but half the bottle leaked out during delivery!
customer_reviews.author: allison m.

customer_reviews.title: Good, pricy, probably worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My only knock is the price. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: RedandBlue

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my father-in-laws cemetery granite plot . Applying it every few days just to get that shinny look.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: clean, but not necessarily shine
customer_reviews.text: Unless your countertops already have a polished finish, this Weiman product will NOT enhance their shine or the natural veining that may exist. We have exotic granite/schist that's been honed. The finish does not change appearance after buffing with this product. To the contrary, you can achieve a very lustrous and enhanced veining effect by applying products like Aegr Color Enhancer Sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Weiman Granite Cleaner is the best
customer_reviews.text: I only use Weiman products on my granite, stainless and cook-top. Was recently told by a major appliance dealer that Weiman is their preferred choice for cleaning products. Weiman granite cleaner and polish does the job. Can cut through some spills and still leaves an amazing shine to all granite, even quartz. Definitely a best buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bikus

customer_reviews.title: Good for stone/granite
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a disinfectant and it is ok for granite and stone. Not all those cleaners are good for stone. It make them dull and grimy. This keeps the stone in my kitchen and bathroom nice and disinfected.
customer_reviews.author: sassygirl914

customer_reviews.title: Makes my countertops shine!
customer_reviews.text: I have granite counter tops, I really like this product. It is safe and does not have toxic fumes. This cleaner and polish makes my countertops look like new. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Waldrip

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a bit behind/ need a second wipe down
customer_reviews.text: I think this may be one of my favorite cleaners for granite. Does leave a slippery residue after wiping though. Makes them look extra shiny!
customer_reviews.author: CCM08004

customer_reviews.title: Buff to see the shine
customer_reviews.text: You don't see the shine on the first use. After second to third time of using the Weiman granite clean & shine you will notice there is a difference it gives the deep shine. After spray wipe it clean, then you buff with a microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Seelan K

customer_reviews.title: Another quality Weiman product
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean quartzite, granite, and marble surfaces. I use multiple Weiman products in my home, and this another quality one. Will be adding this to my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Fresh countertops
customer_reviews.text: I just received yesterday and gave my work tops a good wipe down. They do actually feel nice and smooth and possibly brighter. I look forward to maintaining the surface with this cleaner and polish.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope S.

customer_reviews.title: Great granite cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is best granite cleaner I have used. It is virtually streak free and the scent is nice. I have reordered several times.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It cleans my granite kitchen counters and leaves them looking like new and gleaming like a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Does not polish. Save your money and clean with soap and water for the same results
customer_reviews.author: Calibern

customer_reviews.title: Granite looks like new
customer_reviews.text: I have old granite counters that shine after using this product. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: sandy radzik

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a dull finish
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this product is doing what it’s supposed to do. Won’t be purchasing again because it leaves a dull finish, almost filmy on our granite countertops.
customer_reviews.author: J1976

customer_reviews.title: Has wide spray and gets on everything. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.text: Has wide spray and gets on everything. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: 910 Investments, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the counters shiny and film free
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I used other weiman products in the past with great results so when we got new counters I bought this product. I'm happy with the results and would buy it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette

customer_reviews.title: GET IT - IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I first wipe our kitchen granite counters and backsplashes with hot water and a sponge. Once dry, I spray with this and wipe with a microfiber cloth. The granite looks AMAZING! So shiny and clean.
customer_reviews.author: SaladEatingCat

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, leaves my granite countertops gleaming.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Michal Shar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This does a very good job on my granite and makes it clean and shiny. Has no odor at all unlike some other products.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other granite cleaners and all leave streaks or make our really dark granite cloudy. This cleans and leaves the granite streak free and shiney.
customer_reviews.author: KerriB

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used the product, and still debating if I will
customer_reviews.text: To be honest. I’m afraid to use this product after reading the directions and precautions. The directions makes it sound it to be very toxic in itself.
customer_reviews.author: 5-Star Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the product and was glad it was in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the product and was glad it was in the special leak proof bag because it did leak during its travel
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fuqua-Cuen

customer_reviews.title: I woiuld not purchases again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my sink and make them sparkle and it does neither.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a beautiful shine
customer_reviews.text: This brand is very easy to use and leaves a beautiful shine. I am about to reorder
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Leaky shipping
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but they leak in shipping and make a mess. I returned the first set and then the replacement came exactly the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Crippler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on paint.
customer_reviews.text: I know this product didn’t say it would clean paint, but we had a sink that had paint in it from a contractor. Was hoping that this cleaner would clean it up an it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Goldian

customer_reviews.title: Small bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Be forewarned, these bottles are half the size of a typical spray bottle

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job - Almost
customer_reviews.text: Great polish, but I wish it was better at removing small scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t what I expected, couldn’t tell the difference when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dat-Saw-C-1

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Clean
customer_reviews.text: I had new quartz put in and couldn't get rid of a film on it caused by other cleaners. This stuff leaves the stone feeling clean and has a subtle shine.
customer_reviews.author: Inimitable

product_meta.title: Weiman Disinfectant Granite Daily Clean & Shine - 12 fl oz (2 Pack) Safely Clean Disinfect and Shine Granite Marble Soapstone Quartz Quartzite Slate Limestone Corian Laminate Tile Countertop
feature_bullets: New Disinfecting Formula Kills the following viruses in 10 minutes on hard, non-porous surfaces: Influenza A (H1N1), Human Coronavirus (ATCC VR-740)
Multi-Use - Superior performance on countertops, floors, shower stalls, kitchen sinks, bathroom sinks, tubs, floors & other hard, non-porous surfaces
Surface Safe - For Non-porous Sealed Granite, Sealed Marble, Sealed Limestone, Sealed Slate, and Glazed Tile in kitchens, bathrooms, and other household areas
Cleans, Shines and Disinfects - Keep your home safe from harmful bacteria, germs, smells, and dirt
#1 Trusted Brand - Weiman is a trusted cleaning brand for most of your home's delicate, difficult to care for surfaces; clean, protect and enjoy your home with Weiman
